name: steal-a-taco-from-taco-bell-today-freebies
title: Steal A Taco From Taco Bell Today [Freebies]
author: Morgan Levy
tags: steal a base steal a taco
contentEncoded: It’s not really stealing, per se, since they’re giving them out for free… But everyone is entitled to one free crunchy beef taco between 2pm and 6pm today at Taco Bell. We can thank this year’s World Series teams for stealing a handful of bases this year, but couldn’t we at least get a free taco for every base stolen? Don’t be so stingy with the crunchy beef, Taco Bell. Anyway, enjoy your free tacos (an astonishing $0.89 value) this afternoon.
